--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, "secretary" <secretarytocapt3@h...> wrote:
> Not bad...if it has some of the detail seen in such games as Soul 
> Calibur 1&2 or Onimusha then it'll be awesome...I noticed that the 
> uniforms have elements of the Gohatto design...
> 
> Many games allow for the customization of uniforms...e.g. Dynasty 
> Warriors 4...I wonder if this game has that feature...in which case 
> fangirls may choose the "no shirts" option LOL! ^_^


I am very amused by the fact that they remembered to put Saitou's 
katana on the righthand side so he can draw with his left hand.

Perhaps I should not be scrutinizing these pictures as much as I am.

Angrybee
